name: Mars Rover
description:
HTML VERSION is bugged!

Please download the standalone version for testing, as that one seems to work, even though it's built from the same code.

The APATHY Mars Rover is out of control. The throttle is jammed open, however it still responds to directional controls.

Click on the grid and set the rotation to guide the rover to the next antenna checkpoint in each level.

Use the scanner to record alien artefacts, but keep in mind it uses twice the power!

-speed!

Game made for the GMTK 2020
